name: New Zealand Research Information System (NZRIS) Data Specifications Status
maintainer: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Definition: The award or project is proceeding
The award or project is inactive for a specific time-bound reason (e.g. lead researcher not available)
The award or project has been completed in full and has been closed
The award or project has been partially completed and has been closed
The award or project has been closed prior to any work being done
